pullrequest.title: Bump ign sensors dependencies to use gz11 dependencies

content.raw: I've forked these changes to osrf/release-tools to be able to use them with our default infrastructure in the `javi_ign_sensor_gz11` branch.  Testing the changes here: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_sensors-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/3/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/3/console)
